SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository

Class AnnouncementRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.repository.AnnouncementRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AnnouncementRepository extends Object implements Serializable
The Announcement repository.

This class saves the announcements in an ArrayList.

This class ofers the methods to filter and sort the announcements.

See Also:

      public void addAnnouncementFromImportedFile(int sid, String owner_name, int owner_passportNum, String owner_TIN, String owner_email, String owner_phone, String property_type, int property_area, String property_location, int property_distanceFromCenter, String property_numberBedrooms, String property_numberBathrooms, String property_pnumParking, String property_centralHeating, String property_airconditioned, String property_basement, String property_loft, String property_sunExposure, int property_requested_sale_rent_price, int property_sale_rent_price, int commission, String contract_duration, Date property_dateAnnounceRequest, Date property_dateofSale, String type_business, int store_ID, String store_name, String store_location, String store_phonenumber, String store_emailAddress)
      Adds an announcement to the repository, imported from a .csv file
      Parameters:
      sid - - announcement id
      owner_name - - owner name
      owner_passportNum - - owner passport number
      owner_TIN - - owner TIN
      owner_email - - owner email
      owner_phone - - owner phone
      property_type - - property type
      property_area - - property area
      property_location - - property location
      property_distanceFromCenter - - property distance from center
      property_numberBedrooms - - property number of bedrooms
      property_numberBathrooms - - property number of bathrooms
      property_pnumParking - - property number of parking spaces
      property_centralHeating - - property central heating
      property_airconditioned - - property airconditioned
      property_basement - - property basement
      property_loft - - property loft
      property_sunExposure - - property sun exposure
      property_requested_sale_rent_price - - property requested sale/rent price
      property_sale_rent_price - - property sale/rent price
      commission - - commission
      contract_duration - - contract duration
      property_dateAnnounceRequest - - property date announce request
      property_dateofSale - - property date of sale
      type_business - - type of business
      store_ID - - store id
      store_name - - store name
      store_location - - store location
      store_phonenumber - - store phone number
      store_emailAddress - - store email address
